column5: An all points bulletin. We haven't heard from Sam of Carra Outdoors since April 15th. I know he was busy as a one-armed paper hanger helping folks with the flood problems they had out his way. Anyone have any news?
Sam appears well Roy, he was posting on Quintefishing.com just yesterday.
OK Lew. Thanks for the news. I was just a little worried is all.
It's also turkey hunting season Roy, I'm sure he is being kept really busy with that too!
I was in there yesterday. He's fine. He was busy, so I didn't get a chance to talk to him.....  Sinker
